options.content:
NB. All times are UTC
### Notes | From | To | Notes | | ---- | ---- | ---- | | then | now | did something cool |

panels.description: Total of IOPS for rbd devices within the cluster
panels.title: Client IOPS

matcher.options: {container="mgr", endpoint="http-metrics", instance="10.131.0.10:9283", job="rook-ceph-mgr", managedBy="ocs-storagecluster", namespace="openshift-storage", pod="rook-ceph-mgr-a-84fb4f8597-5b2mg", prometheus="openshift-monitoring/k8s", service="rook-ceph-mgr"}

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total[1m]) * on(instance, device) group_left(ceph_daemon) label_replace(label_replace(ceph_disk_occupation, "instance", "$1", "exported_instance", "(.*)"), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)")) + sum by(instance) (rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total[1m]) * on(instance, device) group_left(ceph_daemon) label_replace(label_replace(ceph_disk_occupation, "instance", "$1", "exported_instance", "(.*)"), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)"))

sum by(instance) (rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total[1m]) * on(instance, device) group_left(ceph_daemon) label_replace(label_replace(ceph_disk_occupation, "instance", "$1", "exported_instance", "(.*)"), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)")) + sum by(instance) (rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[1m]) * on(instance, device) group_left(ceph_daemon) label_replace(label_replace(ceph_disk_occupation, "instance", "$1", "exported_instance", "(.*)"), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)"))

panels.description: Count of rbd images with read activity
panels.title: RBDs Active
